document_data.name: ''Dagger of Truth''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Daggers of truth''''' were [[curse]]d weapons that originated in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Description: As with non-magical [[dagger]]s, these weapons were available in a wide variety of shapes and sizes.
document_data.Powers: ''Daggers of truth'' did make it easier for the wielder to strike their target. However, the curse of the weapon prevented the wielder from ever telling a lie.
